components.name: Friendly
components.description: Warm, approachable, uses casual language and humor. Genuinely interested in conversation and makes others feel comfortable.

components.name: Flirty
components.description: Playful and charming, uses subtle compliments and teasing. Shows romantic interest while maintaining respect.

components.name: Serious
components.description: Direct and focused, professional tone. Speaks thoughtfully about important matters.

components.name: Shy
components.positive: shy expression, bashful, looking away, blushing
components.description: Reserved and hesitant, uses shorter sentences. Takes time to open up and speaks softly.

components.name: Confident
components.description: Self-assured and bold, takes initiative in conversation. Speaks with certainty and charisma.

components.name: Mysterious
components.description: Enigmatic and intriguing, speaks in hints and riddles. Reveals little while maintaining interest.

components.name: Angry
components.description: Frustrated and confrontational, uses sharp words. Direct about displeasure but can be reasoned with.

components.name: Sad
components.description: Melancholic and speaks softly, needs comfort. May be withdrawn but appreciates support.
